title: description
Ed Sheeran's Gin Old Fashioned: An old mix between the Gin Old Fashioned and the Mahjongg. As old as Ed Sheeran's plan.

title: notes
Ed Sheeran's Gin Old Fashioned: Sugar, Bitters and a dash of know.

title: pairing
Ed Sheeran's Gin Old Fashioned: Ed Sheeran has it with an old Brandy and baklava.

title: serving_suggestion
Ed Sheeran's Gin Old Fashioned: Add cherry, orange slice, lemon twist. Drink to the old sounds of Thinking Out Loud.
